content: भ्रमिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [भ्रम्-इ] {@--1@} Whirling or turning round, circular movement; moving about or round, revolution; <ls>U. 3. 19</ls>; <ls n="U.">6. 3</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5. 23.</ls> {@--2@} A potter's wheel. {@--3@} A turner's lathe. {@--4@} A whirlpool {@--5@} A whirlwind. {@--6@} A circular arrangement of troops. {@--7@} An error, a mistake.
